price: (67) And they will say, "Our Lord, indeed we obeyed our masters and our dignitaries,[1213] and they led us astray from the [right] way.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّآ أَطَعۡنَا سَادَتَنَا وَكُبَرَآءَنَا فَأَضَلُّونَا ٱلسَّبِيلَا۠
footnotes: [1213]- Also interpreted to mean "our noble ones and our elders [i.e., distinguished scholars]."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqālū rabbanā innā aṭaʿnā sādatanā wakubarāanā fa-aḍallūnā al-sabīlā
